fig.label: Figure 1
fig.sd-panel: A Turbidity and bright-field microscope images of indicated groups (left) and the quantitative analysis of turbidity of samples were measured by absorbance at 600 nm (right). 10 μM cGAS, 5 μM G3BP1, 5 μM BSA and 100 nM dsDNA (60 bp) were used in these assays. n = 3 biological replicates. Data information: Representative images are shown Error bars, mean with s.d. , *P < 0.05, ****P < 0.0001, two-tailed t-test. NS, non-significant. Scale bars, 10 μm

B cGAMP production assays. Recombinant cGAS (10 μM) and G3BP1 (10 μM) were incubated with 100 nM dsDNA. The produced cGAMP was quantitatively analyzed by Liquid Chromatography-Mass Spectrometry/Multiple Reaction Monitoring (LC-MS/MRM). ND, not detected. n = 3 technical replicates.

C Bright-field microscope images of cGAS (10 μM) with indicated concentrations of BSA or G3BP1 (left) and a quantitative analysis of the total area of condensates (right). n = 3 biological replicates. Data information: Representative images are shown Error bars, mean with s.d. , *P < 0.05, ****P < 0.0001, two-tailed t-test. NS, non-significant. Scale bars, 10 μm

D Time-lapse imaging of liquid droplets fusion after mixing 10 μM cGAS-mCherry with 1 μM FAM-labeled dsDNA. Data information: Representative images are shown Error bars, mean with s.d. Scale bars, 5 μm (D)
E Time-lapse imaging of liquid droplets fusion after mixing 40 μM cGAS-mCherry with 10 μM G3BP1-mEGFP. Data information: Representative images are shown Scale bars 3 μm (E)

F FRAP analysis of DNA-induced droplets of cGAS (1 μM dsDNA, 10 μM cGAS-mCherry), the yellow dotted circle indicated the region of photobleaching.
G FRAP curve of (F). n = 3 biological replicates.
H FRAP analysis of cGAS-G3BP1 droplets. 10 μM cGAS-mCherry and 5 μM G3BP1 were used. The yellow dotted circle indicated the region of photobleaching.
I FRAP curve of (H). n = 3 biological replicates.
Data information: Representative images are shown (A, Error bars, mean with s.d. , *P < 0.05, ****P < 0.0001, two-tailed t-test. NS, non-significant. FRAP, Fluorescence recovery after photobleaching. Scale bars, 2 μm (F and H).

fig.label: Figure 2
fig.sd-panel: A Immunofluorescent staining of cGAS in both wild-type (WT) and G3BP1-/- U937 cells. Leica TCS SP8 Confocal Microscopy was used to acquire images. The white arrows indicate the cGAS-G3BP1 condensates. Data information: Representative images are shown Scale bars, 5 μm. Hoechst (blue), nuclear staining.

B Immunofluorescent staining of cGAS in both WT and G3BP1-/- U937 cells. 3D images were reconstituted with Leica LAS X software.
C Quantitative analysis of total cGAS puncta number (left) and volume (right) per cell of (B). n = 51 cells.
D Data information: Representative images are shown Scale bars, 5 μm. Hoechst (blue), nuclear staining. Error bars, mean with s.d , *P < 0.05, **P < 0.01, ****P < 0.0001, two-tailed t-test. NS, non-significant. WT, wild-type.
D Immunoblotting of fractionated lysates from WT and G3BP1-/- U937 cells. GAPDH and Lamin B1 blots were used as controls for cytoplasmic and nuclear fractions, respectively.

E qPCR analysis of IFNB mRNA levels in HT-DNA-treated WT and the indicated rescued cells (U937) (top). Immunoblotting analysis of indicated proteins (bottom). n = 3 biological replicates. Data information: Error bars, mean with s.d , *P < 0.05, **P < 0.01, ****P < 0.0001, two-tailed t-test. NS, non-significant. WT, wild-type. IB, immunoblotting. HT-DNA, Herring testes DNA.

F ELISA analysis of the secreted IFN-β in HT-DNA-treated WT or G3BP1-/- U937 cells. n = 3 biological replicates. Data information: Error bars, mean with s.d , *P < 0.05, **P < 0.01, ****P < 0.0001, two-tailed t-test. NS, non-significant. WT, wild-type. HT-DNA, Herring testes DNA.

G cGAMP production in ISD-treated WT or G3BP1-/- U937 cells were analyzed by LC-MS/MRM. ND, not detected. n = 3 technical replicates.
Data information: Error bars, mean with s.d , *P < 0.05, **P < 0.01, ****P < 0.0001, two-tailed t-test. NS, non-significant. WT, wild-type. ISD, interferon stimulatory DNA.

fig.label: Figure 3
fig.sd-panel: A Time-lapse imaging of cGAS-G3BP1 condensates. Data information: Representative images are shown Scale bars, 10 μm 45 μM cGAS-mCherry, 10 μM G3BP1-mEGFP were used in the assays.

B Fluorescence intensity distribution on cGAS-G3BP1 droplets. A quantitative analysis of a representative cGAS-G3BP1 droplet is shown. Along the white line on the merged image, the fluorescence intensity of both G3BP1 and cGAS channels were recorded. Data information: Representative images are shown Scale bars, 10 μm 45 μM cGAS-mCherry, 10 μM G3BP1-mEGFP were used in the assays.

C Time-lapse imaging of cGAS-DNA droplets in the presence of G3BP1-mEGFP. Data information: Representative images are shown Scale bars, 10 μm 45 μM cGAS-mCherry, 10 μM G3BP1-mEGFP, 2 μM dsDNA were used in the assays.

D cGAS, G3BP1 and Cy5-dsDNA were incubated. A quantitative analysis of a representative cGAS-DNA droplet is shown. Along the white line on the merged image, the fluorescence intensity of G3BP1, cGAS and dsDNA channels were recorded. Data information: Representative images are shown Scale bars, 10 μm 45 μM cGAS-mCherry, 10 μM G3BP1-mEGFP, 2 μM dsDNA were used in the assays.

E Time-lapse imaging of condensates formed by cGAS, G3BP1 and dsRNA. Data information: Representative images are shown Scale bars, 10 μm 45 μM cGAS-mCherry, 10 μM G3BP1-mEGFP 2 μM dsRNA were used in the assays.

F cGAS, G3BP1 and Cy5-dsRNA were incubated. Similar quantification analysis as in D was performed.
Data information: Representative images are shown Scale bars, 5 μm 45 μM cGAS-mCherry, 10 μM G3BP1-mEGFP, 2 μM dsRNA were used in the assays.

fig.label: Figure 4
fig.sd-panel: A, B Recombinant cGAS (10 μM) and the indicated amounts of Cy5-labeled dsDNA were incubated, with or without G3BP1 (2 μM). The DNA-induced cGAS-DNA liquid droplets were analyzed with time-lapse imaging. Data information: Representative images are shown Scale bars, 10 μm

C Quantitative analysis of (A). The partition coefficient was calculated as the total fluorescence intensity of droplets / bulk fluorescence intensity of background. n = 3 biological replicates. Data information: Error bars, mean with s.d. , **P < 0.01, two-tailed t-test.

D cGAMP production assays. Recombinant cGAS (10 μM) was incubated with the indicated amounts of dsDNA, with or without G3BP1 (10 μM). The produced cGAMP was quantitatively analyzed by LC-MS/MRM. n = 3 technical replicates. Data information: Error bars, mean with s.d. , **P < 0.01, two-tailed t-test.

E, Immunofluorescent staining of cGAS in WT and G3BP1-/- U937 cells were transfected with ISD (2 μg ml-1) for 3 h (E). Hoechst (blue), nuclear staining. Data information: Representative images are shown Scale bars 20 μm ISD, interferon stimulatory DNA.
, F The percentage of cells with cGAS foci was quantified, n = 3 biological replicates (F). Data information: Error bars, mean with s.d.

G qPCR analysis of IFNB mRNA levels in WT and G3BP1-/- U937 cells transfected with dsDNA as indicated. n = 3 technical replicates.
Data information: Error bars, mean with s.d. , **P < 0.01, two-tailed t-test.

fig.label: Figure 5
fig.sd-panel: A Schematic drawing of domain architecture and truncations of human G3BP1.
B Coomassie blue staining of purified cGAS, full length and truncated G3BP1 recombinant proteins.

C cGAS-G3BP1 interaction analysis. Full-length and truncated G3BP1 was pulled-down using anti-Flag M2 beads. The cGAS-G3BP1 interaction was further analyzed with immunoblotting (IB). 2 μg recombinant full-length cGAS and 2 μg each of truncated G3BP1 were used in the assay.

D, Time-lapse imaging of DNA-induced LLPS of cGAS, in the presence of full length or truncated G3BP1 (2 μM) n = 3 biological replicates.10 μM cGAS, 100 nM dsDNA were used in the assay Data information: Representative images are shown Scale bars, 10 μm

, E Partition coefficient of D was calculated as the total fluorescence intensity of droplets / bulk fluorescence intensity of background (E). n = 3 biological replicates.10 Data information: Error bars, mean with s.d.

F cGAMP production assays. Recombinant cGAS (10 μM) and full length or truncated G3BP1 (10 μM each) were incubated, in the presence or absence of dsDNA (200 nM). The produced cGAMP was quantitatively analyzed by LC-MS/MRM. n = 3 technical replicates.
Data information: Error bars, mean with s.d.

fig.label: Figure 6
fig.sd-panel: A Bright-field microscope images of indicated groups (left) and a quantitative analysis of total area of droplets (right). n = 3 biological replicates. 10 μM cGAS, 5 μM G3BP1 and 50 μM KCl, 50 μM MgCl2, 50 μM ZnCl2 were used. Data information: Representative images are shown Scale bars, 10 μm. Error bars, mean with s.d. , *P < 0.05, **P < 0.01, ***P < 0.001, two-tailed t-test. NS, non-significant. NT, non-treated.

B cGAMP production assays. Recombinant cGAS (10 μM) and indicated ions (100 μM) were incubated with or without dsDNA (100 nM). The production of cGAMP was analyzed by LC-MS/MRM. n = 3 technical replicates. Data information: Error bars, mean with s.d. , *P < 0.05, **P < 0.01, ***P < 0.001, two-tailed t-test. NS, non-significant. NT, non-treated.

C Fluorescent images and analysis of DNA-induced cGAS LLPS in the presence of the indicated reagent. n = 3 biological replicates. 10 μM cGAS, 50 μM of each ion and 100 nM dsDNA were used in these assays. Data information: Representative images are shown Scale bars, 10 μm. The Partition coefficient was calculated as the total fluorescence intensity of droplets / bulk fluorescence intensity of background Hoechst (blue), nuclear staining. Error bars, mean with s.d. , *P < 0.05, **P < 0.01, ***P < 0.001, two-tailed t-test. NS, non-significant. NT, non-treated.

D Fluorescent images and analysis of DNA-induced LLPS of cGAS in the presence of different amounts of ZnCl2. n = 3 biological replicates. 10 μM cGAS and 100 nM dsDNA were used in the assay. Data information: Representative images are shown Scale bars, 10 μm. The Partition coefficient was calculated as the total fluorescence intensity of droplets / bulk fluorescence intensity of background Hoechst (blue), nuclear staining. Error bars, mean with s.d. , *P < 0.05, **P < 0.01, ***P < 0.001, two-tailed t-test. NS, non-significant. NT, non-treated.

E Fluorescent images and analysis of DNA-induced LLPS of cGAS in the presence of G3BP1 (2 μM) and/or ZnCl2 (20 μM) as indicated. n = 3 biological replicates. Data information: Representative images are shown Scale bars, 10 μm. The Partition coefficient was calculated as the total fluorescence intensity of droplets / bulk fluorescence intensity of background Hoechst (blue), nuclear staining. Error bars, mean with s.d. , *P < 0.05, **P < 0.01, ***P < 0.001, two-tailed t-test. NS, non-significant. NT, non-treated.

F cGAMP production assays. Recombinant cGAS (10 μM), G3BP1(10 μM) and ZnCl2 (100 μM) were incubated with or without dsDNA (100 nM) as indicated. The produced cGAMP was quantitatively analyzed by LC-MS/MRM. n = 3 technical replicates. Data information: Error bars, mean with s.d. , *P < 0.05, **P < 0.01, ***P < 0.001, two-tailed t-test. NS, non-significant. NT, non-treated.

G Immunofluorescence staining of cGAS in HeLa cells stimulated with ZnCl2 (100 μM). The images were acquired by ZEISS LSM 880 Confocal Microscopy.
Data information: Representative images are shown Scale bars, 10 μm. Hoechst (blue), nuclear staining.

fig.label: Figure 7
fig.sd-panel: A Fluorescent images of cGAS-G3BP1 droplets in the presence or absence of 10 μM EGCG (left). The partition coefficient was calculated as the total fluorescence intensity of droplets / bulk fluorescence intensity of background (right), n = 3 biological replicates. 45 μM cGAS-mCherry and 10 μM G3BP1-mEGFP were used in these assays. Data information: Representative images are shown Scale bars, 10 μm Error bars, mean with s.d. , *P < 0.05, **P < 0.01, ***P < 0.001, ****P < 0.0001, two-tailed t-test. NS, non-significant.
B Schematic drawing of the full-length and truncations of G3BP1.

C EGCG-G3BP1 interaction analysis. EGCG was pulled-down using EGCG conjugated sepharose beads. The EGCG-G3BP1 interaction was further analyzed by immunoblotting. Data information: Representative images are shown IB, immunoblotting. WCL, whole cell lysate.

D Fluorescent images of DNA-induced LLPS of cGAS, with or without G3BP1, in the absence or presence of 10 μM EGCG (left). The partition coefficient was calculated as in (A), n = 3 biological replicates. 10 μM cGAS, 5 μM G3BP1 and 100 nM dsDNA were used in these assays. Data information: Representative images are shown Scale bars, 10 μm Error bars, mean with s.d. , *P < 0.05, **P < 0.01, ***P < 0.001, ****P < 0.0001, two-tailed t-test. NS, non-significant.

E cGAMP production assays. Recombinant cGAS (10 μM) and G3BP1 (10 μM) were incubated, in the presence or absence of dsDNA (200 nM), with or without EGCG (20 μM). The produced cGAMP was quantitatively analyzed by LC-MS/MRM. n = 3 technical replicates. Data information: Error bars, mean with s.d. , *P < 0.05, **P < 0.01, ***P < 0.001, ****P < 0.0001, two-tailed t-test. NS, non-significant.

F cGAS-G3BP1 interaction analysis. cGAS was precipitated using anti-cGAS antibodies in U937 cells treated with EGCG as indicated. IgG served as control. The cGAS-G3BP1 interaction was further analyzed by immunoblotting. Data information: Representative images are shown WCL, whole cell lysate. IP, immunoprecipitation.

G cGAMP production assays. U937 cells were untreated (left) or treated (right) with EGCG (20 μM), followed by HT-DNA transfection. The produced cGAMP was quantitatively analyzed by LC-MS/MRM. ND, not detected. n = 3 technical replicates. Data information: Error bars, mean with s.d. , *P < 0.05, **P < 0.01, ***P < 0.001, ****P < 0.0001, two-tailed t-test.

H, U937 cells were untreated (left) or treated (right) with EGCG (20 μM), followed by HT-DNA transfection. qPCR analysis of IFNB mRNA expression in cells were performed. n = 3 biological replicates. NS, non-significant.
Data information: Error bars, mean with s.d. , *P < 0.05, **P < 0.01, ***P < 0.001, ****P < 0.0001, two-tailed t-test. NS, non-significant. WT, wild-type.

I U937 cells were untreated (left) or treated (right) with EGCG (20 μM), followed by HT-DNA transfection. ELISA analysis of secreted IFN-β (I) were performed. n = 3 biological replicates. NS, non-significant.
Data information: Error bars, mean with s.d. , *P < 0.05, **P < 0.01, ***P < 0.001, ****P < 0.0001, two-tailed t-test. NS, non-significant.

fig.label: Figure 8
fig.sd-panel: Schematic drawing of G3BP1 engaging cGAS in a primary condensation state to enable a rapid response to DNA
